Heading: Chronological
Note: A Bible with the text organized in the order in which events are believed to have happened

Heading: Chain reference
Note: A Bible which explores keywords or themes by referring text to preceding or following text

Heading: Interlinear
Note: A Bible or other text in which different versions are printed one line above the other, so that the variations can easily be detected

Heading: Parallel
Note: A Bible with two or more versions printed side by side

Heading: Standard
Note: A Bible in which the text is presented in the traditional order
